column3: Tere Behan Aur Bhai Lagte Hai
column4:
['Tere behan aur bhai lagte hai mujhe kasai ho', '
Kya yeh prem ki batti jalne denge ke nahin', '
Ari bol shabbo bol sangam hoga ki nahin', '
Nahin kabhi nahin', 'Teen meri bahene aur chaar mere bhai', '
Saato hi mere amma baba ki kamaai', '
Aankhein jo dikhayega to karenge dhulaai', '
Leza waapas aake teri ye lugaai', '
Kaise padhu main pyaar ka pahada', '
Kar diya haay tumne mera kabaada', 'Socha thaa ke shaadi karke aish karenge', '
Socha thaa ke shaadi karke aish karenge', '
Pyaar wala check hum kesh karenge', '
Haan pyaar wala check hum kesh karenge', '
Haan ji haan oye oye haan ji haan oye oye', '
Na na na na nare naare naare', '
Na na na na nare naare naare', '
Na na na na nare naare naare', '
Na na na na nare naare naare', 'Bacha bacha zaher lage', '
Bacha bacha zaher lage', '
Laayi hai dahez mein inhein', '
Kaahein tu baapu ke ghar se', '
Aallaa re aallaa re', 'Ho in sasuro ko dekha toh aisa laga', '
In sasuro ko dekha toh aisa laga', '
Jaise kaanto ke jhaad jaise zaher ke pahaad', '
Jaise dengyu bukhaar jaise bichhu ke haar', '
Jaise raavan ke roop jaise neem ka soop', '
Jaise dushman ne di ho koi bad duaan ho', 'Tujhe pitane ko dil karta hai', '
Ho gochu tujhe pitane ko dil karta hai', '
Jo bhi mann mein aaye woh bakta hai', '
Tujhe pitane ko dil karta hai', 'Saat ullu pade pade', '
Ghoore humko khade khade', '
Saat ullu pade pade', '
Ghoore humko khade khade', '
Sach sach main kaheti hoon sun lo aji', '
Gaadenge tambu yahin pe sabhi', '
Raat bhar muye', '
Raat bhar muye milane na de', '
Beete dikhaye bade bade', 'Kambakhto kambakhto futo kahin', '
Miyaan biwi ko zara chhodke', '
Khele kabaddi armaan dil mein', '
Aao gusedun tumhein saapo ke bil mein', 'Khatiya ke neeche kya hai', '
Khatiya ke neeche', '
Parde ke pichhe kya hai', '
Parde ke pichhe', '
Ho khatiya ke neeche bhaai', '
Parde ke pichhe bahena', '
Ye meri aankh ke taare', '
Ye mere ghar ka gahena', '
Haayo rabba main kyaa karun', '
Kahaan marun', '
Chup chup chup chup chup chup', '
Chup chup chup chup chup chup are chup', 'O didi bolo na ye kundi kholo naa', '
Ke babloo rota hai guddu nahin sota hai', '
Ke chinki ladati hai mujhe tang karti hai', '
Ke chhutki darti hai ke', '
Dekho chintu ko khasi aati hai', '
O didi bolo na ye kundi kholo naa', '
O didi bolo na ye kundi kholo naa.']
